title: 115_s204
content: Trickett Wendler, Frank Mongiello, Jordan McLinn, and Matthew Bellina Right to Try Act of 2017 (Section2)This bill amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to exempt,nbsp, fromnbsp. Specified requirements and restrictions under that Act and other laws, the provision of certain unapproved, investigational drugs to a terminally ill patient who has exhausted approved treatment options andnbsp. Is unable to participate in a clinical trial involving the drugs. The manufacturer or sponsor of an eligible investigational drug must report annually to the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) on any use ofnbsp. The drug in accordance with these provisions. The FDA shall post an annual summary report of such use on its website. The bill limitsnbsp, the liability ofnbsp, a sponsor, manufacturer, prescriber,nbsp. Or dispenser that provides, or declines to provide, an eligible investigational drug to an eligible patient in accordance with the bill.
